welcome_benefits: Hotel Voucher Worth ₹1,000. Flight Voucher Worth ₹2,000 on Spends of ₹10,000.

Movie & Dining: 25% Off Upto ₹100 on Movie Ticket Bookings
Rewards Rate: 3% Adani Reward Points on Spends Made With Adani Ecosystem
Reward Redemption: Redeem Points on Adani Rewards. 1 Adani Reward Point = ₹1
Travel: Premium Lounge Upgrade at Mumbai Airport (T2)
Domestic Lounge Access: 2 Complimentary Airport Lounge Access Each Quarter

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Annual Fee Waiver on Spends of ₹3 Lakh or More
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Surcharge Waiver on Fuel Transactions Between ₹400 and ₹4,000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the Amount Withdrawn, Subject to a Minimum of ₹500

product_details: Get exclusive airport privileges at all Adani-managed airports.
Free domestic airport lounge access is offered along with the card.
Get up to 3 Adani reward points/₹100 on spends made on Adani One.
Comes at an affordable joining and annual fee of ₹750 + GST.
